video.title: The Gates
video.synopsis: Life in an upscale, gated community is more dramatic than anticipated for a young police chief who must contend with resident werewolves and witches.

episodes.synopsis: The Monohan family moves into their home in the Gates, an exclusive community with perfectly manicured lawns and decidedly strange neighbors.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Nick investigates the death of the last chief of police and is deeply disturbed by the mysteries he is discovering about the Gates.
episodes.title: What Lies Beneath

episodes.synopsis: There's a series of mysterious robberies around town, and Brett tries to re-ignite his relationship with Andie, though she is still drawn to Charlie.
episodes.title: Breach

episodes.synopsis: A missing hunter brings unwanted attention to the pack, while Nick and Dylan try to put their differences aside during a father-daughter dance.
episodes.title: The Monster Within

episodes.synopsis: No sooner is Nick assailed with the revelation that vampires exist and are living inside the Gates, than he finds himself forced to ally with one.
episodes.title: Repercussions

episodes.synopsis: When a neighbor is murdered by a vampire, Nick enlists Dylan to find the killer. Sarah organizes a fundraiser, but finds it hard to achieve harmony.
episodes.title: Jurisdiction

episodes.synopsis: Finding themselves blackmailed by Frank Buckley, Nick and Dylan set out to dig up a secret on him that is equally damning.
episodes.title: Digging the Dirt

episodes.synopsis: When Lukas's father is assaulted and left for dead, Nick must diffuse a potential turf war between Vampires and Werewolves.
episodes.title: Dog Eat Dog

episodes.synopsis: FBI agent Kat Russo arrives at Nick's precinct in search of a criminal, but the deeper Russo digs, the closer she comes to uncovering dark secrets.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: When a madman kidnaps their daughter, Dylan and Claire enlist Nick, but as the search intensifies, Nick learns the truth about the couple's past.
episodes.title: Little Girl Lost

episodes.synopsis: As Nick investigates a grim secret, his past once again comes back to haunt him, and this time the demons are more real than he could fathom.
episodes.title: Surfacing

episodes.synopsis: Buckley and Vanessa make a hard decision that threatens to destroy the neighborhood, while Sarah seeks relief after learning about the Supernaturals.
episodes.title: Bad Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: After Vanessa and Frank's deaths, the Monohans make plans to move from the Gates, but their plans are interrupted when Charlie runs away with Andie.
episodes.title: Moving Day
